description:
Workflow from markury

https://civitai.com/models/618997?modelVersionId=697441
The checkpoint goes in ComfyUI/models/unet (not checkpoints)
Download the original weights here:
https://huggingface.co/black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-dev/blob/main/flux1-dev.sft

Download the fp8 version for <24gb vram systems:
https://huggingface.co/Kijai/flux-fp8/blob/main/flux1-dev-fp8.safetensors

Text encoders go in ComfyUI/models/clip:
https://huggingface.co/comfyanonymous/flux_text_encoders/tree/main

VAE (ae.sft) goes in ComfyUI/models/vae:
https://huggingface.co/black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell/blob/main/ae.sft

Download the fp8 t5xxl for degraded quality but less RAM use
Launch ComfyUI with "--lowvram" arg (in the .bat file) to offload text encoder to CPU.

I can confirm this runs on:
- RTX 3090 (24gb) 1.29s/it
- RTX 4070 (12gb) 85s/it
Both running the fp8 quantized version. The 4070 is very slow though.

input_prompt.name: input_prompt
input_prompt.default:
This image is a highly detailed digital illustration in an anime art style. It features a young woman with long, flowing silver hair that cascades past her shoulders, with soft, shiny highlights giving it a vibrant, almost metallic appearance. Her hair is styled in loose waves, and she has large, expressive purple eyes that convey a sense of calm and confidence. She has a fair complexion and delicate features, with a slight blush on her cheeks, adding a touch of warmth to her otherwise neutral expression.

She is wearing a strapless, form-fitting dress made of a shiny silver fabric that reflects light, creating a glossy texture. The dress has a high collar and a bow at the chest, accentuating her slim figure and modest breast size. The neckline is deep, revealing her collarbone and shoulders.

The background is a plain, light gray, ensuring that the focus remains entirely on the character. In the lower left corner, there is a small, stylized Japanese character, possibly representing her name or a personal symbol. The overall composition is clean and polished, with attention to detail in both the character's attire and her facial expressions, typical of high-quality anime art

input_prompt.name: input_prompt
input_prompt.default: The image depicts a scene from the anime series Dragon Ball Z, with the characters Goku, Elon Musk, and a child version of Gohan sharing a meal of ramen noodles. They are all sitting around a dining table, with Goku and Gohan on one side and Naruto on the other. They are all holding chopsticks and eating the noodles. The table is set with bowls of ramen, cups, and bowls of drinks. The arrangement of the characters and the food creates a sense of camaraderie and shared enjoyment of the meal.

input_prompt.name: input_prompt
input_prompt.default: Extreme close-up photograph of a single tiger eye, direct frontal view. The iris is very detailed and the pupil resembling a dark void. The word "Chroma" is across the lower portion of the image in large white stylized letters, with brush strokes resembling those made with Japanese calligraphy. Each strand of the thick fur is highly detailed and distinguishable. Natural lighting to capture authentic eye shine and depth.

input_prompt.name: input_prompt
input_prompt.default: beautiful bikini babe smiling laughing on the beach sunset volleyball match playstation 1 still, low poly, <lora:LOW_POLY_PLAYSTATION_1_STILL.safetensors:1.0>

description:
TIPS:

- hide noodles by pressing the 
  dedicated ComfyUI button in the 
  bottom right "👁️"

- Go to SETTINGS, search for:
  "Display animated previews when 
  sampling"
  Turn it ON to watch the video 
  build directly in the sampler 
  node.

- Fast Lora may works best when 
  combined with other Loras, 
  allowing you to reduce the 
  number of steps.

- Wave Speed can significantly 
  reduce inference time but may 
  introduce artifacts.

- Achieving good results requires 
  testing different settings. 
  Default configurations may not 
  always work, especially when 
  using LORAs, so experiment to 
  find settings that fits best.

- If you're experiencing poor 
  results or glitches, you can 
  also try to switch to different 
  sampler/scheduler, such as 
  LCM, DDPM, DDMPP_2M, Euler or 
  the new "Gradient_estimation"
  (Samplers/schedulers need to be 
  set for each stage and mode; 
  they are not settings found in 
  the console)

input_prompt.name: input_prompt
input_prompt.default: A sultry zoom pan of a young woman's hourglass figure in a flowing gown in a {sunlit|moonlit|misty} meadow bursting with {vibrant|wilted|delicate} wildflowers. A {white|lavender|blue} flower is tucked behind her ear, adding a touch of elegance to her natural beauty. Her serene expression exudes {peace|melancholy|wonder} and connection with nature. {Sunbeams|soft moonlight|golden rays} filter through the trees, casting a {warm|cool|dreamy} glow on her skin, while soft petals from nearby blossoms gently drift in the breeze. Her {long hair|short curls|braided hair} flows naturally, blending with the {lush|barren|overgrown} surroundings. The scene captures the form of her figure, from the {smooth|textured|freckled} skin to the slight curve of her waist, as the {radiant|ethereal|soft} natural light emphasizes her beauty and the {tranquil|nostalgic|mysterious} atmosphere. {bokeh|soft focus|cinematic blur}. professional photography. Realistic Style.<lora:petravoiceflux2:3>

description:
The day after the publication of the first official HUN I2V model, an update was released—version v2. It's up to you to decide which one to use; you'll find the links below.
All the other nodes and modules present in the setup area, like Wave Speed, TeaCache, Fast LoRA, 
are left there at the user's discretion to use or activate. 
They are not essential for the functioning of I2V.


Experiment with settings!








  
FILES REQUIRED:

_
https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/HunyuanVideo_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/clip_vision/llava_llama3_vision.safetensors?download=true
in:
ComfyUI\models\clip_vision
_

https://huggingface.co/Kijai/HunyuanVideo_comfy/tree/main
or   
https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/HunyuanVideo_repackaged/tree/main/split_files/diffusion_models

in:
ComfyUI\models\diffusion_models

_

TIPS:

- Select a fp8 weight_dtype if you 
  are running out of  memory.


- hide noodles by pressing the 
  dedicated ComfyUI button in the 
  bottom right "👁️"

- Go to SETTINGS, search for:
  "Display animated previews when 
  sampling"
  Turn it ON to watch the video 
  build directly in the sampler 
  node.

- Fast Lora may works best when 
  combined with other Loras, 
  allowing you to reduce the 
  number of steps.

- Wave Speed can significantly 
  reduce inference time but may 
  introduce artifacts.

- Achieving good results requires 
  testing different settings. 
  Default configurations may not 
  always work, especially when 
  using LORAs, so experiment to 
  find settings that fits best.

- If you're experiencing poor 
  results or glitches, you can 
  also try to switch to different 
  sampler/scheduler, such as 
  LCM, DDPM, DDMPP_2M, Euler or 
  the new "Gradient_estimation"
  (Samplers/schedulers need to be 
  set for each stage and mode; 
  they are not settings found in 
  the console)

input_prompt.name: input_prompt
input_prompt.default: sexy underwater model posing and swimming,

description: Resolution should be around 1 megapixel and width/height must be multiple of 64

The checkpoint goes in ComfyUI/models/unet (not checkpoints)
Download the original weights here:

Both running the fp8 quantized version. The 4070 is very slow though.
